doc.title: El Relojero: The Clockmaker's Revelation
doc.plot: Inspired by the Mexican surrealist Remedios Varo, filmmaker Paula Froehle interprets one of Varo's quintessential works, el relojero, or Revelation of the Clockmaker. Using VFX to bring the painting to live, a young clockmaker diligently focuses on her own concepts of time while clocks build up around her, revealing alternate versions of herself. The work culminated with the revelation - a spinning universe - appears int eh window. But when the clockmaker is distracted by noises in the room, the revelation disappears, and with it the world of time the clockmaker has built up around herself.
